title: AbstractReferenceType
description: Generic reference object containing the universal properties of reference data, especially the ones commonly thought of as Types

Name.description: The name of the entity instance.

NameAlias.description: Alternative names, including historical, by which this entity instance is/has been known.

ID.description: Surrogate key to uniquely identify an instance in a domain list.

InactiveIndicator.description: This is set to T (True) if the instance is no longer in use.

Description.description: The text which describes a NAME TYPE in detail.

Code.description: The abbrevation or mnemonic for facility type if defined. Example: WELL amd WLBR.
